title: How to Make a Lavender and Bergamot Air Freshener

steps.headline: Pour the vodka and distilled water into a clean spray bottle.
Add the drops of essential oils.
Label and date.
steps.description: Make it clear to anyone using it that it is air freshener.

steps.headline: Use.
steps.description: Simply spritz it into the air in any household room. About 3 to 5 sprays should be adequate for an average size room.

text: Pour the vodka and distilled water into a clean spray bottle.  Add the drops of essential oils.  Shake well to combine.  Label and date. Make it clear to anyone using it that it is air freshener. Use. Simply spritz it into the air in any household room. About 3 to 5 sprays should be adequate for an average size room.
